hero.title: Client Success Stories
hero.subtitle: Trusted by professionals to land $100K–$350K tech roles.

items.name: Raymond B.
items.quote: I went from zero onsites to three in four weeks. We tightened my narrative, rebuilt my resume, and practiced the hardest questions until they felt automatic. I closed at $350K with a negotiation plan I could defend.

items.name: Sasha L.
items.quote: My resume finally sounded senior. Two weeks later my calendar was full. The interview coaching sharpened my stories so I wasn’t rambling under pressure.

items.name: Neil R.
items.quote: Negotiation stopped being awkward. We mapped my leverage, rehearsed the ask, and the offer jumped. I walked away confident and respected.

items.name: Alina K.
items.quote: They pulled a leadership throughline out of my chaos. The story finally made sense to hiring managers, and every interview felt cleaner.

items.name: Jordan T.
items.quote: Clarity coaching felt like a reset. We turned scattered projects into one clear narrative, and the feedback in interviews changed immediately.

items.name: Priya S.
items.quote: Portfolio review was brutal (in a good way). We tightened the storyline and rehearsed the walkthroughs until they landed every time.

items.name: Miguel A.
items.quote: We killed cold apps and built an outreach system that actually converted. Warm intros became normal, not luck.

items.name: Tara J.
items.quote: Same effort, double the response rate. The positioning matched the roles I wanted, and recruiters finally saw it.

items.name: Kevin D.
items.quote: First inbound recruiter message in months. The resume + LinkedIn overhaul flipped the script completely.

items.name: Rina M.
items.quote: Positioning shifted me from technical doer to trusted lead. That’s what sold it in panel interviews.

items.name: Evan P.
items.quote: I used to ramble. The prep gave me crisp, confident stories and a clean structure I could rely on.

items.name: Camila V.
items.quote: I negotiated a level up because I could finally defend my value. That confidence changed everything.

items.name: Omar H.
items.quote: The outreach script alone changed my hit rate. Warm intros became normal, not rare.

items.name: Lena Q.
items.quote: Mock interviews took the fear out of the room. I finally walked in with a plan instead of hope.

items.name: Miles S.
items.quote: We made the process simple and repeatable. No more burnout, just a system I could trust.

items.name: Isabelle C.
items.quote: The leadership narrative opened doors I thought were out of reach. It felt like I finally belonged at the table.

items.name: Noah G.
items.quote: The interview framework turned my answers into punchy, memorable stories. It made me feel in control again.

items.name: Hannah W.
items.quote: I went from scattered interviews to a focused strategy that actually closed. The difference was night and day.

items.name: Diego R.
items.quote: Offer strategy coaching paid off in the final round. I got the number I wanted and felt good about it.

items.name: Maya N.
items.quote: Resume rebuild + negotiation prep were the turning point. I finally stopped second‑guessing every step.

items.name: Vikram P.
items.quote: I was stuck explaining models instead of impact. We reworked my narrative and I landed an offer in the first cycle.

items.name: Lauren D.
items.quote: Askia helped me move from tactical to strategic in how I spoke. The interviews immediately felt different.

items.name: Arjun S.
items.quote: We tightened my system design story and built a repeatable prep routine. The final round felt calm and clean.

items.name: Chloe H.
items.quote: I thought I needed more experience. Turns out I needed a better story. I got the offer I wanted.

items.name: Marcus J.
items.quote: We rebuilt my resume around outcomes and reliability. My callback rate went from silence to steady.

items.name: Sofia R.
items.quote: Interview prep gave me a playbook. I stopped improvising and started winning rounds.

items.name: Amir K.
items.quote: The portfolio strategy made my work feel cohesive. I finally got feedback that felt excited.

items.name: Grace T.
items.quote: They helped me translate data work into business impact. Hiring managers leaned in.

items.name: Diego M.
items.quote: We set a clear compensation target and built the negotiation around it. I got there without stress.

items.name: Riya V.
items.quote: Askia brought structure to my search and cut the noise. I stopped chasing everything and started closing.

cta.title: Book your free strategy call
cta.body: Ready to take the next step? Let’s build a plan that gets results.
